title: Just Eat Takeaway to delist from London Stock Exchange in blow to UK market
content: Dec. 24 will mark the last date of trading of Just Eat Takeaway's shares on the London Stock Exchange.

title: 'Europe's Detroit' built a thriving car industry. Trump tariffs now threaten to unravel its success

title: Fed’s preferred inflation gauge rises to 2.3% annually, meeting expectations

title: EasyJet rakes in record $4.5 billion from fare add-ons as CEO slams 'unfair' penalty over practice

title: This personal finance educator says budgeting is ‘toxic’ — try ‘intuitive’ spending instead

title: France's far right propped up the weak government. It could now bring it crashing down

title: Reddit targets international users for ad growth, teases bolstered search feature

title: The shipping industry is wrestling with one of its biggest challenges — seafarer shortages
content: The shipping industry is contending with a shortage of seafarers, and it's fueling a troubling mix of fake resumes, accidents at sea, and higher freight rates.

title: Meet the start-up working to save newborn babies and democratize pregnancy care
content: More than two million babies died in the first 20 days of their lives in 2022, and a startup, Biorithm, hopes to help prevent this with its monitoring device.
